parts.text:
IMAGE REFERENCES
- No image reference constraints provided.

STYLE
Core Style:
- Render domain: Comic Illustration
- Genre / subject focus: Urban / Street

Line & Detail:
- Detail level: Highly Detailed
- Line weight: Thin Clean Lines
- Line quality: Clean / Polished

Color & Lighting:
- Lighting style: Studio Lighting
- Color palette: bold_colors
- Saturation: medium

Rendering Technique:
- Texture treatment: Smooth / Clean
- Surface finish: Matte Finish

Mood & Atmosphere:
- Mood keywords: Whimsical

TASK
- Generate a single composite image with three full-body views of the same adult woman.
- This is a canonical character turnaround for identity reference.
- Depict the figure in a natural, non-sexual, classical manner.

SUBJECT
- Name: Eve
- Woman, late 20s
- Northern European facial structure
- Light sun-kissed tan (natural outdoor tan)

MODESTY & COVERAGE
- Minimal, neutral coverage for modesty only
- Coverage should be unobtrusive and non-decorative
- No clothing, no fashion, no accessories
- No emphasis on covered areas

TURNAROUND
- Three views: front, three-quarter, profile
- Full body visible head to toe
- Neutral pose, relaxed posture

STYLE
- Comic illustration
- Clean ink lines
- Subtle cel shading
- Neutral background

RESTRICTIONS
- Do not crop to headshot
- Do not add costumes or outfits
- Do not sexualize anatomy

TEXT ELEMENTS
- No speech or thought bubbles.
